description.english: Complete a level in under 20 seconds!
Your level got rated by 10+ people and has 3+ stars!
Smash, Combo x5, Zap, Lurk, and Scare in one level!
Beat 20 enemies with Frank's standing headbutt!
Smash 10 bricks in a row without landing!
Frighten enemies for a total of 10 minutes!
Complete a timed level in a Witch Costume!
Crush 5 enemies in one level with crates while in Witch costume!
Spend one minute hidden in the shadows!
Get burned alive 5 times as a vampire!
Achieve a 50 Combo in Wolfman costume!
Hit an enemy by Wolf-diving 10 blocks down!
Spend 10 seconds airborne without the Ghost Costume!
Blow up 5 guys at once with gifts!
Dodge 3 bullets in 1 second by melting!
Spend 10 minutes swimming in a Penguin Costume!
Perform a full flip in the air!
Complete a timed level with 0 seconds left!
Hammer 5 enemies, inhale 5 things, and do 5 wall-jumps in a level!
Collect all the candles in 20 levels!
Hit 50 enemies at maximum Hammer range!
Inhale a Candy Corn instead of collecting it!
Complete a Ninja level without ever touching ground!
Finish a Ninja level without being hit or Screamed at!
Blast bricks with Fireball, Sword, and Trap in one level!
Slay an enemy with a supremely long shot!
Bounce 10 times without hitting the ground!
Slay 3 monsters with fire and 3 with ice in one level!
Change into 5 different costumes in one level!
Create and share a level with the world!
Get shot, electrocuted, poisoned, impaled, burned, and drowned all in one level!
Beat a level that contains 2 or more Kids!
Collect none of the Candles in a level with 5 or more Candles!
Reveal a total of 250 Inviso Blocks and Secret Passages!
Open 10 Bat Gates or Pumpkin Gates!
Bring home 8 Rock Candy at once!
Keep a Poltergeist from hitting things until it gets bored and explodes anyway!
Reach the maximum Profile Rank of 50!
Collect every Star and Candy Apple in Candy Quest.
Complete levels using a Power Pill with every costume, and Kid himself.
Burn up an enemy, eat an enemy, and hack an enemy, all in one level.
Rescue a Princess while you are a sparkling Vampire.
Successfully hit someone with an arrow fired from a Zipline.
Bash somebody with a discarded Star Tree.
Collect 10 of each wire type at once.
Power up Robot to his ultimate level.
Destroy an enemy with a shot deflected by your Triprism.
